mapper.select: SELECT b_num, b_name, b_title, to_char(b_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS b_date , readcnt FROM spring_board ORDER BY b_num desc
mapper.insert: Insert into spring_board ( b_num, b_name, b_title, b_content, b_pwd) values (spring_board_seq.nextval, #{b_name}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_pwd})
mapper.select: select nvl((select 1 from spring_board where b_num = #{b_num} and b_pwd = #{b_pwd}), 0) as result from dual
